title: Rules of Survival:  The First Chronicles of Jani Kilian #1-3
description:
If you like crime-fighting heroines, you'll love Jani Kilian, a human-alien hybrid with a bad reputation. 
Rules of Survival
 collects her first three adventures in an exclusive hardcover edition.Code of Conduct: Badly injured in the idomeni's civil war, Captain Jani Kilian was implanted with their genetic material … but now it's breaking down. Called to look into the mysterious death of her ex-lover's wife, Jani stumbles upon secrets that could make her the next victim … if her body doesn't kill her first. In Rules of Conflict, Jani faces trial for her actions in the war, for what she knows … and for what she has become. And in Law of Survival, Jani is officially a civilian … who has run afoul of top political and criminal powers.
author: Kristine Smith
